title: Was re-rolling skins and client froze
body:
I went to re-roll my Masked Shaco, Unmasked Kayle, and Viking Tryndamere skins and then the client froze. Client's been really buggy.. Anyways, I decided to wait and nothing happened so I just restarted. Now I have none of the three skins I tried to re-roll and I don't have a new skin. HELP RIOT.

I have a screenshot of the re-roll and frozen client if you need it I can email it.

replies.body: I checked your account and I'm seeing that you received Master Chef Tahm Kench as a result of the re-roll.  Double checked your current champion/skin inventory and seeing it there as well, so let me know if you aren't able to see/use the skin
